## ### --- VPSVPS VPSShadowsocksVPN **:)** [][1] Home2.994.99(2.99256M) {% qnimg 2017-07-20/2017_07_20_1.png %} `VPS Hosting->Services->My Services` VPS KiwiVM Control Panel {% qnimg 2017-07-20/2017_07_20_2.png %} `Install new OS``centos-6-x86` VPS {% qnimg 2017-07-20/2017_07_20_3.png %} [Putty][8] IP {% qnimg 2017-07-20/2017_07_20_4.png %} VPS ### --- IP zhuangbi - **TK** - **Namecheap** TkTKCOMNETCN Namecheap IP DNS {% qnimg 2017-07-20/2017_07_20_6.png %} NameCheap: [namecheap2017][2] OK ! **:)** ## Hexo **(Windows)** --- ,[Hexo][3]`Node.js` Hexo ### --- VPSNginxWebhexogit ### Node.js --- [Node.js][4] ### Git --- [Git for windows][5]next Git[][6] SSH 1. `C:\Users\<>\.ssh` 2. `Git Bash Here` 3. git ``` git config --global user.email "email@example.com" git config --global user.name "username" ``` ### ssh --- `id_rsa.pub` `ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "email@example.com"` {% qnimg 2017-07-20/2017_07_20_5.png %} ### --- `C:\hexo`() ### Hexo --- `cmd`(****)`cd``hexo``node`() ``` npm install -g hexo-cli hexo init npm install hexo d -fg ``` ,`C:\hexo` hexo`themes`[Hexo][7] {% qnimg 2017-07-20/2017_07_20_7.png %} hexo server `hexo serve(hexo s)` `http://localhost:4000` `hexo serve(hexo s)` hexo server {% qnimg 2017-07-20/2017_07_20_8.png %} VPS ## Hexo **(VPS)** --- VPS`Centos 6``root`VPSWindows [Putty][8] Putty `vi``i``esc`` ` `wq` ### Git --- Putty ``` yum update && apt-get upgrade -y # yum install git-core ``` ### nginx --- Putty `yum install nginx -y` ### gitsudo --- Putty ``` adduser git chmod 740 /etc/sudoers # vim /etc/sudoers ``` vi ``` ## Allow root to run any commands anywhere rootALL=(ALL) ALL ``` `git ALL=(ALL) ALL` (`vi``:wq`) `chmod 440 /etc/sudoers #` ### gitssh --- ``` su git cd ~ mkdir .ssh && cd .ssh touch authorized_keys vi authorized_keys // Winodwskeyid_rsa.pub cd ~ mkdir hexo.git && cd hexo.git git init --bare ``` (`hexo.githexo`) {% qnimg 2017-07-20/2017_07_20_9.png %} **git bash**`ssh git@VPSIP`, ### git --- ``` cd /var/www mkdir hexo chown git:git -R /var/www/hexo ``` (`hexo`) ### git hooks --- ``` su git cd /home/git/hexo.git/hooks # hooks,mkdir hooks vim post-receive ``` (`vim`:wq`) ``` #!/bin/bash -l GIT_REPO=/home/git/hexo.git #git TMP_GIT_CLONE=/tmp/hexo PUBLIC_WWW=/var/www/hexo # rm -rf ${TMP_GIT_CLONE} git clone $GIT_REPO $TMP_GIT_CLONE rm -rf ${PUBLIC_WWW}/* cp -rf ${TMP_GIT_CLONE}/* ${PUBLIC_WWW} ``` (`hexo.githexo`) `GIT_REPO``PUBLIC_WWW``TMP_GIT_CLONE` `chmod +x post-receive` `chown git:git -R /`owner ### Nginx --- `vim /etc/nginx/conf.d/hexo.conf` ``` server { listen 80 ; root /var/www/hexo;///var/www/hexo server_name example.com www.example.com;//IP access_log /var/log/nginx/hexo_access.log;//log error_log /var/log/nginx/hexo_error.log;//log location ~* ^.+\.(ico|gif|jpg|jpeg|png)$ { root /var/www/hexo;// access_log off; expires 1d; } location ~* ^.+\.(css|js|txt|xml|swf|wav)$ { root /var/www/hexo;// access_log off; expires 10m; } location / { root /var/www/hexo;// if (-f $request_filename) { rewrite ^/(.*)$ /$1 break; } } } ``` Nginx `service nginx restart` (gitroot`su root`) ### hexo --- `hexo``_config.yml`,`deploy` ``` deploy: - type: git repo: ssh://git@VPSIP:/home/git/hexo.git#VPSgit(git hooks) branch: master - type: git repo: ssh://git@github.com/hexo.git#github branch: master ``` hexo`shift`cd`hexo g && hexo d`pushblog`appears not to be a git repo`hexo`.deploy``hexo g && hexo d` ### --- MarkDown Blog `*.md``[]\source\_posts` **`UTF-8`** Windows hexo`hexo g && hexo d` ### --- hexo`hexo g && hexo d`, github, markdown, `html`, github **:)** ## --- - `hexo d``spawn git ENOENT`[Git][6] - `hexo g` `hexo-delopyer-git` - `hexo d` VPSpublichexo`.git``.git` - `ssh git@ip``22`VPS`ssh` `.ssh``config` ``` Host // VPSIP HostName // VPSIP User git Port // SSH IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa ``` {% qnimg 2017-07-20/2017_07_20_10.png %} - `ssh -T git@github.com``github` `git config --list` `git config` - ngix `yum install nginx -y` `/etc/yum.repos.d``nginx.repo, ``` [nginx] name=nginx repo baseurl=http://nginx.org/packages/centos/$releasever/$basearch/ gpgcheck=0 enabled=1 `nginx -v` ``` {% qnimg 2017-07-20/2017_07_20_11.png %} - `yum install git``Git``/bin/bash: git: command not found` `yum install git git-svn git-email git-gui gitk -y` - sshssh`ssh: connect to host localhost port 22: Connection refused` ``` sshd yum install openssh-server sshd chkconfig sshd on chkconfig iptables off() 22(service sshd restart) ``` - `hero d``ERROR Deployer not found: git` blog `npm install hexo-deployer-git --save` {% qnimg 2017-07-20/2017_07_20_12.png %} - `node``npm` ``` node --version npm --version ``` - warning: LF will be replaced by CRLF | fatal: CRLF would be replaced by LF http://blog.csdn.net/feng88724/article/details/11600375 Git conflicreset ``` git reset --hard FETCH_HEAD git pull origin master ``` - keygit Step1 github `C:\Users\<>\.ssh``id_rsa.pub`Github`Settings->SSH and GPG keys->New SSH key` Step2 [VPS][9] `C:\Users\<>\.ssh``Git Bash Here`, `ssh-copy-id git@vpsIP` - `hexo g && hexo d`**git hooks** `hexo g && hexo d`VPS`www/hexo/`download github`hexo.git` 1. public keyadd github`/home/git/.ssh/authorized_keys`Winodwskey 2. hexo`_config.yml` ``` deploy: - type: git repo: ssh://git@VPSIP:/home/git/hexo.git#VPSgit(git hooks) branch: master - type: git repo: ssh://git@github.com/hexo.git#github branch: master ``` 3. `C:\hexo\``**Git Bash Here**`**Windows**Permission denied, please try again." {% qnimg 2017-07-20/2017_07_20_13.png %} `ssh -T git@github.com`github `hexo g && hexo d`githubgit hooks OpenSSHgitok - `C:\hexo\``.gitignore` `git status` [](10) **:)** ``` git rm -rf --cached . git add . git commit -m "xxxxx" git push origin master ``` - Next [Next](11) **HTML** `themes\next\layout\_macro\post.swig``layout``post.swig``post-content` commentpost-bodycommentpost-body ```
